backend/main.mo: Defines project, message, category types with comparison and filtering utilities, plus authorization mixin and in-memory maps for projects, featured items, messages, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requests to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in the portfolio site's UI, hooks, content, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and applies base backgrounds, borders, and text colors.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx and defines the document head and root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component setting dark theme, rendering all content sections, and showing a global background and toaster.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Modal displaying project details with escape-close logic, image, description, category display, and featured tag.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with a glass panel, glowing avatar, orbiting chips, and short descriptive bio about the designer.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via mutation, and social/WhatsApp links using a styled GlassPanel.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Displays a carousel of featured projects, falling back to placeholder items when backend data is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Renders the site footer with dynamic year, hostname-based referral link, and styling elements.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Creates an animated hero banner with parallax effects, floating text, and buttons that scroll to portfolio or contact sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Shows filterable project grid with category selection and modal display, using backend or placeholder project data.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists service cards with icons and neon-styled GlassPanel elements using TiltCard interactions.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Renders animated skill progress bars triggered on viewport entry and respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/components/visual/GlassPane: Provides a reusable glassmorphism-styled container with configurable neon border colors.
frontend/src/components/visual/GlobalBac: Renders an animated starfield canvas background with reduced-motion support and layered visual effects.
frontend/src/components/visual/OrbitingC: Renders skill chips positioned in a circular orbit with optional floating animation based on reduced‑motion preference.
Creates a card that tilts in 3D based on cursor movement unless reduced‑motion is enabled.
Provides placeholder project and featured item data with IDs, descriptions, categories, and image URLs.
frontend/src/content/siteConfig.ts: Exports basic site configuration including name, WhatsApp link, and social links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Builds and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewOnce.ts: Custom hook that reports when an element enters the viewport once using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching projects, categories, featured items, and submitting contact messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables, animations, theming, scrollbar styling, and reduced‑motion rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Main entry mounting the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/reducedMotion.ts: Provides utilities for detecting reduced‑motion preference and adjusting animation durations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and clearing them for persistence and security.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for a neon sci‑fi style UI with extended shadows, keyframes, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state and requirements for a futuristic 3D sci‑fi portfolio site, including visual direction, features, and architectural notes.
